Name: Discovery Yard Police
About the game: Discovery Yard Police is a game that takes place in the same universe created by BRUNOARTS. Now the mission is different, leaving the detective skills aside. Your goal now is to answer calls for help and resolve conflicts. On one side 'Police' and on the other side 'Invaders' and totally multiplayer! You and your friends must complete the objectives of each map by neutralizing the enemies choosing the best strategy, different paths and making decisions that make the games always different! A dynamic Team Deathmatch game! Scenarios: Discovery Yard Police brings new scenarios and with references to its other title 'Discovery Yard Investigation'. And over time new maps with objectives will appear! And they will always be the most different! In the game: You will choose a team, your weapons, your equipment, decide among your friends how the plan will be, where to go, how to attack or defend and who will enter the places first. Every decision will always be important to achieve victory. Good luck, have fun and welcome to the new Discovery Yard department!
